channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: The tables have turned as even the #PakistanCricketBoard did
item.description: The tables have turned as even the #PakistanCricketBoard did not put up a candidate against #JayShah, who won the right to become #ICCâ€™s next Chairman uncontested via CrickIt | #PCB #BCCI

item.title: #SWIPE | AAP leader #ManishSisodia's #DelhiPadyatra enters
item.description: #SWIPE | AAP leader #ManishSisodia's #DelhiPadyatra enters day 10, people of #Janakpuri welcome him with joy and extend heartfelt support to the #ArvindKejriwal government

item.title: After playing the role of #VanrajShah on the #TVshow #Anupam
item.description: After playing the role of #VanrajShah on the #TVshow #Anupamaa for four years, #SudhanshuPandey announced his departure from the show
